page.title: Molecules Properties Pane
page.introduction: The molecules properties tree on a left allows editing of the molecule name, adding/editing/deleting sites and site states. Right pane is uneditable and provides real-time updates of the molecule composition.

list.item: Molecule name: Right click to Rename/Add Site.
Molecule site: Right click to Delete/Rename/Add State.
Site state: Right click to rename/delete.
